GeneralInquiry.title: General Inquiry
GeneralInquiry.description: A general inquiry submitted through the contact form.

name.description: The full name of the person making the inquiry.

phone.description: The mobile number of the person.

requirement.description: The description of the hardware or material requirement.

submittedAt.description: The timestamp when the inquiry was submitted.

DealerInquiry.title: Dealer Inquiry
DealerInquiry.description: An inquiry from a potential dealer.

name.description: The full name of the contact person.

companyName.description: The name of the dealer's company.

phone.description: The mobile number of the contact person.

email.description: The email address of the contact person.

message.description: The detailed message or inquiry from the potential dealer.

submittedAt.description: The timestamp when the inquiry was submitted.

/generalInquiries/{inquiryId}.description: Stores all general inquiries submitted through the website's contact form.

/dealerInquiries/{inquiryId}.description: Stores all dealer inquiries submitted through the website's 'Become a Dealer' form.
